title: TMC Notification 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 12 Technician Posts
description: The Tata Memorial Centre (TMC) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 12 Technician Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, ITI can grab this chance and apply for the TMC Notification 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below. If you are looking for more, he...
